name.en: Introduction to Digital Media and Technology

description:
本課程核心目的，著重於引導學生認識數位媒體科技發展知識與未來產業應用領域。本課程核心目標：(1)數位媒體與科技發展、(2)未來媒體科技應用。期望修畢本課程之學生，能具備數位媒體科技知識，發揮創意並能加以運用於各領域業界發展。
The main focus of this course is to lead students towards an understanding of the evolving landscape of digital media technology and its prospective applications across industries.
The central goals of this course encompass: (1) Exploring the progression of digital media and technology, and (2) Examining the forthcoming applications of media technology.
Upon completion of this course, students are expected to acquire proficiency in digital media technology, demonstrate creative thinking, and effectively apply their knowledge across diverse sectors for professional advancement.

syllabus.zh:
1. 數位媒體科技發展之創意構思
2. 數位媒體科技應用設計案例
3. 數位媒體科技未來發展現況
4. 數位媒體技術現況分析與調查
5. 設計企劃提案與評估
6. 原型設計與驗證
syllabus.en:
1. Creative ideas for the development of digital media technology
2. Digital media technology application design cases
3. The future development of digital media technology
4. Analysis and investigation of current status of digital media technology
5. Design planning proposal and evaluation
6. Prototyping and verification

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 學習數位媒體科技基礎發展知識
運用設計之軟硬體工具執行專案
運用創意方法產生具有創意的價值
學習團隊合作完成設計專案報告
